TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE . He is represented before the ORG by Mr O. Kılıç , a lawyer practising in GPE .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

Until DATE the applicant lived in the ORG village in the GPE district of the NORP province . In DATE the applicant ’s village was forcibly evacuated by security forces on account of intense terrorist activities in the region . Subsequently , the applicant ’s house was burned down along with the other houses in the village . He is still living in ORG with his family .
On DATE the applicant filed a petition with ORG NORP Governor , requesting compensation for his losses and permission to return to his village .

On DATE ORG GPE Governor replied to the applicant ’s petition , stating that the operations in the applicant ’s village were still continuing and that he would be resettled when public order in the region was re - established . There was no explanation in the context of the reply as regards the applicant ’s claim for compensation of his loss . The applicant did not challenge this reply .
The applicant was residing in ORG . According to his statement of CARDINAL DATE , given before ORG , he had only a DATE house in GPE village .
On DATE ORG asked the District Gendarme Commander for information concerning the applicant ’s allegations concerning the destruction and eviction of the ORG village .
On DATE the NORP Commander informed ORG that according to the ORG statements the houses in ORG village were burned down by the terrorist , dressed as security forces .
On DATE ORG gave a decision of nonjurisdiction and referred the file to the office of the Governor .
On DATE the NORP Governor gave a decision of nonprosecution as the alleged offences were not attributable to the security officers .
On DATE the applicant filed a petition with ORG NORP Governor , requesting compensation for his losses and permission to return to his village .

There was no explanation in the context of the reply as regards the applicant ’s claim for compensation of his loss . The applicant did not challenge this reply .
